title: 3 Ways to Get a Fake Korblox Leg in Roblox: Bundles, Recolors, & More

steps.title: Go to the Roblox catalog.
steps.content: Go to the Roblox catalog. Currently there is a way to get fake Korblox using a bundle called "Pirate." However, Roblox has been known to take down bundles like these, so this method may not work indefinitely. If you purchase a Pirate bundle that gets removed, Roblox will refund the Robux you spent on the item. If the Pirate bundle is missing from the catalog, try looking again in a few days. Creators sometimes reupload items that get taken down.

steps.title: Purchase one of the Pirate bundles.
steps.content: Purchase one of the Pirate bundles. Look for the bundles that show the Korblox leg in the preview, as there are other pirate-themed items that will show up when you search "Pirate." There are a few different Pirate bundles, but they all cost 175 Robux ($2.19 USD). If you want to learn how you can earn Robux for your account without buying it, check out this wikiHow article .

steps.title: Equip the Pirate leg.
steps.content: Equip the Pirate leg. You now have a leg that looks like the Korblox leg without the huge price tag.

steps.title: Go to the Roblox catalog.
steps.content: Go to the Roblox catalog. While this method isn't as effective as the Pirate bundle, these items aren't as liable to be taken down by Roblox.

steps.title: Purchase the Fly bundle for 175 Robux.
steps.content: Purchase the Fly bundle for 175 Robux. This totals to about $2.19 USD. If you want to learn how you can earn Robux for your account without buying it, check out this wikiHow article .

steps.title: Purchase a Korblox accessory.
steps.content: Purchase a Korblox accessory. Search for Korblox in the Catalog, then change the type to "Accessory." Select a Korblox accessory that you like. These range in price, but usually hover around 75 to 85 Robux (which is $0.94 USD to $1.06 USD).

steps.title: Equip the Fly leg and the Korblox accessory.
steps.content: Equip the Fly leg and the Korblox accessory. Make sure you equip the Fly leg that is on the same side as the Korblox accessory. This won't make your leg fully invisible, but it will be very skinny and won't be as noticeable.

steps.title: Go to the Roblox catalog.
steps.content: Go to the Roblox catalog. This method looks more realistic than the accessory method, but costs more Robux.

steps.title: Purchase the Pirate Swashbuckler bundle.
steps.content: Purchase the Pirate Swashbuckler bundle. It's an official bundle from Roblox, and it costs 400 Robux (which is $5 USD). If you want to learn how you can earn Robux for your account without buying it, check out this wikiHow article .

steps.title: Purchase a pirate leg recolor.
steps.content: Purchase a pirate leg recolor. Search "pirate leg" in the catalog and look for a pirate leg recolor by Protopoly. There are a ton of options, and each one costs 67 Robux, which is $0.84 USD. If you want a pirate leg that is the same color as the Korblox leg, Protopoly has two items that would work: Blue Infected Leg Recolor (For Pirate) and Dark Cyan Leg Recolor (For Pirate).

steps.title: Equip the peg leg and the pirate leg recolor.
steps.content: Equip the peg leg and the pirate leg recolor. Part of your character's leg will still be visible above the peg leg, but you won't have the whole leg showing like with the Korblox accessory method.
